take old key from antique trunk
unlock wooden door with old key
take half of a bag of chips
put half of a bag of chips on stove

infos.name: kitchen
infos.desc:
A well framed signboard tells you that you are now in the kitchen.

 You see [if c_2 is locked]a locked[else if c_2 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] refrigerator.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The refrigerator contains [a list of things in the c_2]. You look at the price tag glued to the refrigerator. Fifty big ones?! Where'd they buy this refrigerator, some kind of expensive place?[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] The refrigerator is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] You can see a counter. The counter is usual.[if there is something on the s_1] On the counter you see [a list of things on the s_1].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1] But the thing hasn't got anything on it. What, you think everything in TextWorld should have stuff on it?[end if] You see a stove. Why don't you take a picture of it, it'll last longer! [if there is something on the s_2]On the stove you can see [a list of things on the s_2].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2]But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of trash. Oh! Why couldn't there just be stuff on it?[end if] Hey, want to see a kitchen island? Look over there, a kitchen island. The kitchen island is usual.[if there is something on the s_3] On the kitchen island you can see [a list of things on the s_3].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3] But there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] screen door leading east. There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] wooden door leading west. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: bedroom
infos.desc:
Guess what, you are in a place we're calling a bedroom. You begin looking for stuff.

 You bend down to tie your shoe. When you stand up, you notice a chest drawer.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The chest drawer contains [a list of things in the c_0]. You can't wait to tell the folks at home about this![end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] You can make out an antique trunk.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The antique trunk contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] The antique trunk is empty, what a horrible day![end if] You rest your hand against a wall, but you miss the wall and fall onto a king-size bed. The king-size bed is typical.[if there is something on the s_0] On the king-size bed you can see [a list of things on the s_0]. Now that's what I call TextWorld![end if][if there is nothing on the s_0] The king-size bed appears to be empty. Hm. Oh well[end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] wooden door leading east.

infos.name: backyard
infos.desc:
You're now in the backyard.

 Oh, great. Here's a set of chairs. [if there is something on the s_10]On the set of chairs you make out [a list of things on the s_10].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_10]But the thing hasn't got anything on it.[end if] You see a bbq. Why don't you take a picture of it, it'll last longer! [if there is something on the s_8]On the bbq you can see [a list of things on the s_8].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_8]But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if] You make out a patio table. [if there is something on the s_9]On the patio table you can make out [a list of things on the s_9]. There's something strange about this thing being here, but you don't have time to worry about that now.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_9]But the thing hasn't got anything on it.[end if]

 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] screen door leading west. There is an unguarded exit to the south.

infos.name: living room
infos.desc:
You've entered a living room. The room is well lit.

 You can see a couch. The couch is ordinary.[if there is something on the s_5] On the couch you see [a list of things on the s_5].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_5] However, the couch, like an empty couch, has nothing on it.[end if] You hear a noise behind you and spin around, but you can't see anything other than a low table. The low table is standard.[if there is something on the s_6] On the low table you can make out [a list of things on the s_6].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_6] Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it.[end if] You lean against the wall, inadvertently pressing a secret button. The wall opens up to reveal a tv. The tv is ordinary.[if there is something on the s_7] On the tv you see [a list of things on the s_7], so there's that.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_7] But the thing is empty, unfortunately. Aw, here you were, all excited for there to be things on it![end if]

There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: bathroom
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a bathroom. A typical kind of place. You start to take note of what's in the room.

 You make out [if c_3 is locked]a locked[else if c_3 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] toilet.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The toilet contains [a list of things in the c_3].[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] The toilet is empty, what a horrible day![end if] You make out a bath.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The bath contains [a list of things in the c_4].[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] The bath is empty! What a waste of a day![end if] You can see a sink. [if there is something on the s_4]On the sink you see [a list of things on the s_4].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4]But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of junk. Oh! Why couldn't there just be stuff on it?[end if]

There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: garden
infos.desc:
You are in a garden.



There is an unblocked exit to the north.

infos.name: wooden door
infos.desc: The wooden door looks robust. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: screen door
infos.desc: it is what it is, a screen door [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: chest drawer
infos.desc: The chest drawer looks strong, and impossible to destroy. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: antique trunk
infos.desc: The antique trunk looks strong, and impossible to crack. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: refrigerator
infos.desc: The refrigerator looks strong, and impossible to break. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: toilet
infos.desc: The toilet looks strong, and impossible to break. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: bath
infos.desc: The bath looks strong, and impossible to crack. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]
